name: PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions.timeout
description: The timeout property, of the PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions dictionary, represents an hint, given in milliseconds, for the time the script is willing to wait for the completion of the creation operation.

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
refs.description: The definition of 'timeout' in the 'Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1' specification.
